name: Unrighteous Descent
description:
Heaven is corrupted. God is an asshole. You don´t like it. Satan is the only sane person around that opposes the corrupted system. Fight yourself through hords of scary angels trying to stop you on your way to hell in this fast-paste bullet hell vertical sidescroller.  😈👹 💀
